name: APP Control Editor
description:
On popular demand, here comes a buddy app for APP Control, the ATC game on iPhone and iPad, allowing you to create your own airports!

Add runways and intersections, configure them, test your configuration on your iPad, and submit your airport. Our team will review all received airports, and the valid ones will become available for download in the normal APP Control version, for free!

Create real life or fantasy airports, show your creativity, and share with the APP Control community...
